institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Global Job Support Business Rules/Article 6 (Establishment and operation of business guidelines)
contents: Article 6 (Establishment and operation of business guidelines) ① The Chairman may prepare and utilize detailed operation guidelines to efficiently carry out the business pursuant to Article 4. ② ‘Overseas employment training project operation guidelines’ pursuant to Paragraph 1. The following items must be included: 1. Matters relating to the public offering and selection of overseas employment training project operating institutions, 2. Matters relating to the recruitment and management of trainees, 3. Matters relating to management and evaluation of the operating institutions, 4. Results. Matters related to reporting and follow-up management, etc. ③ The ‘Overseas Job Placement Business Operation Guidelines’ pursuant to paragraph 1 shall include the following matters: 1. Matters related to job registration and company confirmation, 2. Matters related to recruitment of job seekers. 3. Matters related to employment placement and support, 4. Matters related to provision of information such as conclusion of employment contract, visa issuance and support for departure, 5. Matters related to holding and supporting overseas job fairs and overseas employment information sessions, 6. Private sector Matters related to overseas employment placement support, 7. Matters related to follow-up management, etc., ④ Deleted September 11, 2020, ⑤ The ‘Overseas Employment Settlement Support Fund Project Operation Guidelines’ pursuant to paragraph 1 shall include the following matters. . Newly established 2020. 9. 11., 1. Matters regarding eligibility and support amount for Overseas Employment Settlement Support Fund ​ Newly established 2020. 9. 11., 2. Matters regarding the holding of the Overseas Employment Settlement Support Fund Deliberation Committee Newly established 2020. 9. 11., 3. Matters regarding the recovery of overseas employment settlement support funds Newly established September 11, 2020
